remarks: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of eventually bounded functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
statement:
elo1mpt.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
elo1mpt.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
elo1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
elo1d.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
elo1d.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ C <_ x ) ) -> ( abs ` B ) <_ M ) $.
elo1d $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
